member.name: M:Rax.Net.Services.Controllers.AgentController.GetAgentDetails(System.Int32)
member.title: Get Agent Details
member.report: Gets details about the machine and its agent.
member.returns: Details about the machine and its agent.
member.errorResponseCodes: 400 - Bad Request, 401 - Unauthorized, 403 - Forbidden, 404 - Not Found, 500 - Service Unavailable

example.code: { "AgentVersion": "1.05.005848", "Architecture": "64-bit", "BackupVaultSize": "35.3 MB", "CleanupAllowed": true, "Datacenter": "ORD", "IPAddress": "192.168.1.1", "IsDisabled": false, "IsEncrypted": true, "MachineAgentId": 213564, "MachineName": "Web Server", "OperatingSystem": "Windows Server 2012", "PublicKey": { "ModulusHex": "a5261939156948bb7a58dffe5ff89e65f0498f9175f5a98288810b8975871e99af3b5dd94057b0fc07535f5f97444504fa35169d461d0d30cf0192e307727c065168c788771c561a9400fb61975e9e6aa4e23fe11af69e9412dd23b0cb6684c4c2429bce139e848ab26d0829073351f4acd36074eafd036a5eb83359d2a698d0", "ExponentHex": 09528 }, "Status": "Online", "TimeOfLastSuccessfulBackup": null, "UseServiceNet": true }

member.name: M:Services.Quattro.com.Controllers.BackupConfigurationController.GetBackupConfigurationNamesForMachineID(System.Int32)
member.title: Get All Backup Configurations for Agent
member.report: Get a list of backup configurations for the specified agent.
member.returns: The list of backup configurations for the specified agent.
member.errorResponseCodes: Bad Request (400), Unauthorized (401), Forbidden (403), Not Found (404), Service Unavailable (500)

example.title: JSON Response
example.code: { [ { "BackupConfigurationId": 158485, "MachineAgentId": 224193, "MachineName": "Web Server", "Flavor": "RaxCloudServer", "IsEncrypted": false, "BackupConfigurationName": "Manual Log Backup", "IsActive": true, "IsDeleted": false, "VersionRetention": 60, "BackupConfigurationScheduleId": 155566, "MissedBackupActionId": 1, "Frequency": "Manually", "StartTimeHour": null, "StartTimeMinute": null, "StartTimeAmPm": "", "DayOfWeekId": null, "HourInterval": null, "TimeZoneId": "Eastern Standard Time", "NextScheduledRunTime": "\/Date(-62135578800000)\/", "LastRunTime": null, "LastRunBackupReportId": null, "NotifyRecipients": "user@rackspace.com", "NotifySuccess": true, "NotifyFailure": true, "Inclusions": [ { "FilePath": "C:\\Websites\\Logs", "ParentId": 158485, "FileItemType": "Folder", "FileId": 47085 } ], "Exclusions": [] }, { "BackupConfigurationId": 158486, "MachineAgentId": 224193, "MachineName": "Web Server", "Flavor": "RaxCloudServer", "IsEncrypted": false, "BackupConfigurationName": "Weekly Website Backup", "IsActive": true, "IsDeleted": false, "VersionRetention": 60, "BackupConfigurationScheduleId": 155567, "MissedBackupActionId": 1, "Frequency": "Weekly", "StartTimeHour": 7, "StartTimeMinute": 23, "StartTimeAmPm": "AM", "DayOfWeekId": 1, "HourInterval": null, "TimeZoneId": "Eastern Standard Time", "NextScheduledRunTime": "\/Date(1358752980000)\/", "LastRunTime": null, "LastRunBackupReportId": null, "NotifyRecipients": "user@rackspace.com", "NotifySuccess": true, "NotifyFailure": true, "Inclusions": [ { "FilePath": "C:\\Websites", "ParentId": 158486, "FileItemType": "Folder", "FileId":47086 }, { "FilePath": "C:\\Websites\\Logs", "ParentId": 158486, "FileItemType": "Folder", "FileId":47087 } ], "Exclusions": [] } ] }

members.member:
BackupConfiguration
Enables/Disables a backup configuration. Disabling a backup configuration does not delete it nor its data. Disabled backup configurations may later be re-enabled.
Details for the backup configuration. See GET /backup-configuration/{backupConfigurationId} Enable/Disable /backup-configuration/enable/{backupConfigurationId} POST 200 - OK
Bad Request (400), Unauthorized (401), Forbidden (403), Service Unavailable (500) =
JSON Enable Request
{ "Enable": true }
JSON Disable Request
{ "Enable": false }

member.name: M:Services.Quattro.com.Controllers.BackupController.ActionRequested(Rax.Net.ViewModels.Backups.BackupActionRequestViewModel)
member.title: Start/Stop A Backup Manually
member.report: Manually start or stop a backup.
member.returns: Identifier of the instance of the backup.
member.normalResponseCodes: 200 - OK when manually starting a backup, 204 - No Content when manually stopping a backup
member.errorResponseCodes: Bad Request (400), Unauthorized (401), Forbidden (403), Not Found (404), Service Unavailable (500)
member.note: When manually starting a backup, provide the backup configuration identifier for Id. When manually stopping a backup, provide the backup identifier for Id.

example.title: JSON Request to Manually Start A Backup
Response when Manully Starting A Backup (The Backup ID)
JSON Request to Manually Stop A Backup

(Rax)", "ExceptionDesc": "Cannot open file \"C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft SQL Server\\MSSQL10_50.MSSQLSERVER\\MSSQL\\DATA\\tempdb.mdf\". (Rax)", "ExceptionDesc": "Cannot open file \"C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft SQL Server\\MSSQL10_50.MSSQLSERVER\\MSSQL\\DATA\\templog.ldf\". The process cannot access the file because it is being used by another process. .", "ExceptionDetails": "1: [WindowsFs.cpp: 157-rax::WindowsFs::Open] Error Code(313): Cannot open file \"C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft SQL Server\\MSSQL10_50.MSSQLSERVER\\MSSQL\\DATA\\templog.ldf\". member.title: Include/Exclude a File to a Restore Configuration

member.note: ParentId is the ID of the restore this file is associated with.

member.name: M:Rax.Net.Services.Controllers.RestoreController.GetRestoreFiles(System.Int32)
member.report: Gets files that should be included and excluded for a restore.
member.returns: List of Restore Files included/excluded in the configuration
member.title: Get Included/Excluded Restore Configuration Files
member.errorResponseCodes: 400 - BadRequest, 401 - Unauthorized 403 - Forbidden 404 - Not Found 500 - Service Unavailable
member.note: Values for Filter: 1 = Include; 2 = Exclude. Values for FileItemType: 0 = File, 1 = Folder, 2 = Database.
